definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: These hospitals are required to install the hardware and software to process smart-card transactions.
sentences.chinese: 要求这些医院安装处理智能卡交易的硬件和软件。

sentences.english: The smart card took care of the hospitalization charges.
sentences.chinese: 我用智能卡支付了住院费。

sentences.english: One version of this so-called smart card is already in use.
sentences.chinese: 这种所谓的智能卡已有一款正在使用。

sentences.english: Authentication of the data is provided through a combination of Smartcards and certificates.
sentences.chinese: 通过结合智能卡和证书来提供数据认证。

sentences.english: A smart card is a mini-computer without the display screen and keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 智能卡是一种微型计算机的键盘和屏幕。

sentences.english: Smart cards store credit-card numbers, personal contact information, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 智能卡存储信用卡号码，个人联系方式等。

sentences.english: The reader or smart card is not ready to accept commands.
sentences.chinese: 读取器或智能卡尚未准备好接受命令。

sentences.english: Most people don't own a smart card reader.
sentences.chinese: 大多数人没有智能卡读卡机。

sentences.english: The bank issues her one of their handy-dandy smart cards.
sentences.chinese: 银行发给她某种便携智能卡。

sentences.english: Yuan and Lüproposed a password auth en tication scheme with smartcards .
sentences.chinese: 袁，吕提出了一种智能卡口令认证方案。

sentences.english: RSA and ECC are two public-key algorithms generally used on smart card.
sentences.chinese: 智能卡上的常用公钥算法为RSA和ECC算法。

sentences.english: This week we're looking at the world of Smart Cards.
sentences.chinese: 本周我们将研究一下智能卡的世界。

sentences.english: We don't want to have to make people carry tokens or smartcards.
sentences.chinese: 我们不希望有让人们携带的令牌或智能卡。

sentences.english: Second, the bank is obliged to hand out whiz - bang smart cards.
sentences.chinese: 其次，银行有义务发行这些智能卡。

sentences.english: Smart cards are a key component of the public-key infrastructure on which E_Commerece is based.
sentences.chinese: 智能卡是基于公钥密码体制电子商务的关键部件。

definition: antipinch (e.g. preventing catching fingers in automatic car windows)
(of a device, e.g. public telephone, ticket inspection machine) designed to have a card or ticket inserted
set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc
(of a device) designed to accept a cassette, cartridge or canister (loanword from "cassette")/designed to have a card or ticket inserted (also written 插卡式[cha1 ka3 shi4]) (loanword from "card")

pinyin: gao1 qing1 shu4 zi4 dian4 shi4

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
